sentence.text: With reduced YAP expression using shRNA or YAP inhibitors, TKI-resistant cells become TKI-sensitive. reduced xenograft tumor size in nude mice and Moreover, combined positive regulation of protein phosphorylation TKI and a YAP inhibitor, statin, prolonged survival among lung cancer patients analyzed by Taiwan National Health Insurance Research database.

positive regulation of protein phosphorylation tyrosine kinase inhibitors (TKIs) have been used in patients with EGFR-mutant as an effective targeted therapy in lung adenocarcinoma, but drug resistance and tumor recurrence inevitably occurs.
